doc.previous: Cameroun Republic s annexation of British Southern Cameroons has escaped International concern and notice mainly because The United Nations creator of the International trusteeship system and the United Kingdom trustee power for the Southern Cameroons for over a century aborted the process of decolonization they had set in motion denying Southern Cameroons sovereign statehood citation needed Also Cameroun Republic has over the years put in place strategies to conceal it s occupation to the world while making token and decorative placements of a few citizens of the Southern Cameroons in its colonial administration a leaf borrowed from French colonial practice citation needed This has served French Cameroun over the years strategically assimilating the people of Southern Cameroons implementing policies of impoverishment of the territory and it s population a sustained attack on their educational and cultural heritage maintaining ethnic strife between the people of the North West and South West citation needed
doc.after: The President of Cameroon is elected and has refers to the assembly to create policy administer government agencies command the armed forces negotiate and ratify treaties and declare a state of emergency 26 The president appoints government officials at all levels from the prime minister considered the official head of government to the provincial governors and divisional officers 27 The president is selected by popular vote every seven years 1
